products.name: Assam Gold
products.description: This is one of the finest and the most traditional variety of the leafy black tea of Assam. When brewed, the liquor is particularly light, brisk, and aromatic.

products.name: Chinese Sencha
products.description: This Chinese Sencha is a distinctive green tea that reflects its Japanese processing and Chinese terroir. The leaves are Long with a crisp dryness and grassy yet subtly floral scent.

products.name: Milk Oolong
products.description: A high quality oolong from the Fujian province, which sends a distinctive rich waft of creaminess as you open the pack.
